title: Githyanki
content:
Githyanki Racial Features Base Racial Speed Astral Knowledge Martial Prodigy Githyanki Psionics

Base Racial Speed Astral Knowledge Martial Prodigy Githyanki Psionics

Githyanki is a Race in Baldur's Gate 3. Githyankis have an option of choosing their skill proficiency. While creating your Character in Baldur's Gate 3, you can choose between 11 different types of Races. Each of them has their own special characteristics.
